name: My Word Coach
description: Ubisoft's My Word Coach for the Nintendo DS will improve your vocabulary and help develop your ability to verbally express yourself with confidence and persuasion. Working closely with applied linguist Dr. Tom Cobb of UQAM University, the award-winning Ubisoft Montreal studio developed My Word Coach to provide a fun and engaging path for all ages to increasing their personal communication skill set. The Nintendo DS version makes use of the systems unique touch screen.
